mapper.select: select * from board order by no desc, createDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into board ( writer, title, content, createDate) values (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, getdate())
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into upload_file (file_id, file_name, file_data) values (#{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileData})
mapper.select: select file_id as fileId, file_name as fileName from upload_file where no = #{no}
select file_name as fileName, file_data as fileData from upload_file where file_id = #{fileId}
